amendment.description: An amendment numbered 168 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds for all offices of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
